page.title: 15INDUSTRY II
page.content: Several traditional village tradesmen exist in the area such as joiner, cabinet maker,builder, plumber and electrician. There's a sub post office and a village shop with tea rooms and craft shop. Two agricultural contractors provide a valuable service to local farmers throughout the year doing all the seasonal jobs for the smaller farmers at a market rate.They are particually busy at the time of silage making and at harvest time. Most of the forest plantations are owned by Lowther Estates who thin out the pine and larch for fencing or timber trade and also a Christmas tree trade is carried out. A small but valuable industry of providing hunting, shooting and fishing for tourists is also carried on by Lowther Estates.
